AppsToDownload.Name: Genuis Scan
AppsToDownload.Description: Used to Scan papers using your camera, and turn them into pdfs. Recommended by one of my old math professors. I found it extremely useful when I was in college.

AppsToDownload.Name: LinkedIn
AppsToDownload.Description: I think it's good to use the app to see notifications, job alerts, etc. I also feel like the app is a little easier to use than the website.

AppsToDownload.Name: Alarmy
AppsToDownload.Description: This is the alarm app I use. I really like the UI, the sound it uses, and the overall features.

AppsToDownload.Name: Waze
AppsToDownload.Description: This is the GPS app I use. It's extremely useful when driving. It can calcult

AppsToDownload.Name: Microsoft Teams
AppsToDownload.Description: This is the GPS app I use. It's extremely useful when driving. It can help you find optimal routes, calculates new routes if you make a wrong turn, and has settings that allow you to avoid freeways, toll roads, etc. It also shows you things like where cops are, crashes, hazards, etc. Overall a super helpful app and I'd definitely recommend it.

AppsToDownload.Name: Uber
AppsToDownload.Description: You probably already know what this is, but I'll describe it anyway. It's basically a taxi service app. You can order an uber/taxi at basically ANY location and it will come pick you up and drive you around. This was very helpful when I needed to get a drug test for my job when I was in Wilmington and didn't have a car. I also think the UI is super cool which is a bonus. Would definetly it.

AppsToDownload.Name: GrubHub
AppsToDownload.Description: If you don't want to wait in massive lines, you can use your UNCW Teal Meals through this app to order ahead of time.

Kinda Obviously.Name: Canvas
Kinda Obviously.Description: Manage your UNCW assignments, view grades, future assignments, etc.

Kinda Obviously.Name: Duo Mobile
Kinda Obviously.Description: Used for two-factor authentication at UNCW and many other places.

Kinda Obviously.Name: Microsoft Outlook
Kinda Obviously.Description: Mangage your UNCW email and other outlook emails
